Package com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncCallback<T>
    The general async task callback class
    AudioSampleCallback
    Audio data (PCM16) callback interface
    GamePad
    Cloud controller interaction APIs
    ILogger Deprecated
    Keyboard
    Cloud keyboard interaction APIs
    Mouse
    Cloud mouse interaction APIs, which can send mouse button events to the cloud.
    MouseInfoListener
    This listener is used to return the information about mouse.
    PcTouchHandler.OnClickListener
    The click listener, which is used to listen for click events triggered in `PcTouchHandler`.
    PcTouchHandler.OnDoubleClickListener
    The double-click listener, which is used to listen for double-click events triggered in `PcTouchHandler`.
    PcTouchHandler.OnLongClickListener
    The long press listener, which is used to listen for long press events triggered in `PcTouchHandler`.
    PinchListener
    The zoom listener
    TcrError
    The definition of a session error
    TcrErrorCode
    This interface defines common error codes of TcrSdk.
    TcrEvent
    Session event definitions
    TcrLogger
    The Log callback interface
    TcrSession
    The current session object for interaction with the cloud instance Note: This object must be used after the `AsyncCallback.onSuccess(Object)` callback of `TcrSession.init(AsyncCallback)`.
    TcrSessionListener
    The session listener
    VideoFrameBufferCallback
    Customize the video data frame callback to call back the raw video data byte stream before decoding.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultClickListener
    The default click listener.
    DefaultLongClickListener
    The default long press listener.
    MobileTouchHandler
    Touch on the mobile game.
    MouseConfig
    The mouse parameter configuration
    PcTouchHandler
    The PC game touch event handler class.
    ScalingHandler
    The two-finger pinch zoom handler class, which implements two-finger pinch zoom and two-finger swipe operations on the view.
    TcrRenderView
    The rendering view, which is used to render the cloud image on the local device.
    TcrSdk  
    VideoCapabilityUtil
    The util to query video capability
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScaleType
    Video scaling modes
    TcrRenderViewType
    Define the two types of the rendering view.
    VideoRotation
    The rotation angle The parameter of TcrRenderView.setVideoRotation(VideoRotation)
